skyra.osceleton

Class OSCeletonWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • skyra.osceleton.OSCeletonWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    oscP5.OscEventListener

    public class OSCeletonWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements oscP5.OscEventListener
    The base class for reading skeletons from OSCeleton into Processing.

      • getClosest

        public Skeleton getClosest()
        Finds the closest skeleton to the sensor. This implementation just looks at the Z-coordinate of the heads of all the people it can see.
        Returns:
        the closest skeleton
